ack.title: ACKNOWLEDGEMENTS
ack.p: We thank Ludo Luckerhoff and John Visser for technical assistance. This work was performed with the framework of a NWO‐Vernieuwingsimpuls; grant number 016.001.023 awarded to MvdH and provided by the Netherlands Organization for Scientific Research. LBM was funded by the Netherlands Organization for Scientific Research through the 2013–2014 BiodivERsA/FACCE‐JPI joint call for research proposals on “Promoting synergies and reducing trade‐offs between food supply, biodiversity and ecosystem services”. MvdH was further supported by a grant from the Swiss National Science Foundation (SNSF), grant no.125428. GBDD acknowledges NWO‐ALW for her support (Vidi grant no. 864.11.003). FIP acknowledges funding by MINECO (grant CGL2014‐59010‐R). DK received a DST‐BOYSCAST fellowship.
